meaningMnemonic: The <radical>odd</radical> radical and the <kanji>odd</kanji> kanji are the same. They're both... really <kanji>strange</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You're <kanji>odd</kanji> too, just like this kanji. But you don't want anyone to know, so you lock away your <kanji>strange</kanji> habits with a <reading>key</reading> (き).
